personas.name: Persona 1
personas.responsibilities: Prospecting new leads, conducting product demonstrations, managing sales pipeline, closing deals
personas.challenges: Understanding complex document workflows, competing against established players, articulating ROI
personas.concerns: Meeting quarterly targets, handling technical objections, building trust with enterprise buyers
personas.knowledge: Basic understanding of SaaS, CRM proficiency, general sales methodology

learningObjectives.text: Demonstrate core Doc-O-Matic features aligned to specific customer use cases and industry requirements
Conduct effective discovery to identify document automation pain points and quantify business impact
